private.title: Private
private.text: Only spreadsheet members can see and edit this spreadsheet.

organization.title: Organization visible
organization.text: All members of the organization can see and edit this spreadsheet.
organization.warn: This spreadsheet must be added to organization to enable this.

upgrade.title: Upgrade plan
upgrade.text: You have reached your plan limit, please upgrade to enable adding more sheets.

project.title: Project
project.text: Opens create project dialog, only Owners and Admins can create project.

request.title: Request
request.text: Opens create request dialog, All members of the spreadsheet can create request.

helper.cta: You can start by adding new spreadsheet

not-found.title: Spreadsheet not found.
not-found.text: This spreadsheet may be private. If someone gave you this link, they may need to invite you to one of their spreadsheets or organizations.

upgrade.msg: Maximum number of environments reached, please {{link}} to enable this functionality!

menu.title: Remove environment
menu.text: It will remove environment and all deployments on this environments.

upgrade.msg: Maximum number of languages reached, please {{link}} to enable this functionality!

menu.title: Remove language
menu.text: It will remove language content and affect opened requests and projects.

upgrade.msg: Maximum number of members reached, please {{link}} to enable this functionality!

error.last-owner: You can’t change roles because there must be at least one owner.

owner.title: Owner
owner.text: Unlimited access, including deletion of spreadsheet.

admin.title: Admin
admin.text: Can view and edit spreadsheet, merge requests, create projects, merge projects, create and delete builds, publish and unpublish builds.

member.title: Member
member.text: Can view spreadsheet and create requests.

remove.title: Remove from spreadsheet
remove.text: Remove all access to the spreadsheet. They will receive a notification.

error.last-owner: You can’t leave because there must be at least one owner.

leave.title: Leave spreadsheet
leave.text: If you leave spreadsheet, you will lose access to it.

upgrade.title: Upgrade plan
upgrade.text: You have reached maximum number of translation strings ({{length}}) per sheet for current plan ({{limit}}), please upgrade to enable adding more strings.

upgrade-max.title: Upgrade plan
upgrade-max.text: You have reached maximum number of translation strings per sheet.

error.DUPLICATE_SHEET_NAME: Sheet with that name already exists

form.message: Are you sure you would like to delete sheet {{name}}? All data will be lost!

error.KEYS_LIMIT: You have reached maximum number of keys in sheet, please upgrade your plan to enable adding more keys.

form.message: Are you sure you would like to delete spreadsheet {{name}}? All data will be lost!
form.text: To be able to proceed please enter name of spreadsheet.

form.message: Are you sure you would like to merge request {{name}}?

builds.title: Builds
builds.no-builds: There are no builds for this sheet

remove.title: Remove build
remove.description: It will delete build and its files.

no-env.title: There are no environments for this spreadsheet.
no-env.owner-subtitle: You can start adding them by going to {{link}} settings.
no-env.subtitle: Contact spreadsheet owner to add environment.

remove.title: Unpublish environment
remove.description: It will remove files from environment.

head.title: Localization made simple | Linguallo
head.description: Localize Web and Native Apps incredibly easy with Linguallo. Simple, scalable and free localization management and localization delivery solution.

login-section.title: Localization made simple
login-section.subtitle: Localize Web and Native Apps incredibly easy with Linguallo. Simple, scalable and free localization management and localization delivery solution.

content-section.title: Translate your content by using our user-friendly and coherent spreadsheets
content-section.subtitle: Linguallo's spreadsheets offer endless possibilities both to organizations and developers and to translators.

hero-section.title: Using Linguallo cuts localization time in half
hero-section.subtitle: No more time consuming manual copy/paste actions. Linguallo's easy-to-use spreadsheets and powerful publisher help you change your translations fast for automatically visible results on your Website and Apps.

flow-section.title: Linguallo lets you work more collaboratively and get more done.
flow-section.subtitle: Linguallo's spreadsheets and sheets enable you to organize your translations in a flexible way.

get-started-section.title: Start Localizing Today
get-started-section.subtitle: Make the most of localization by signing up for Linguallo to get more done.

publisher.title: Linguallo supports many of localization file formats across platforms and programming languages
publisher.subtitle: Importing and exporting from XLIFF and CSV has never been easier. Linguallo's publisher delivers translation files to your Web or Native Apps in different formats such as .json, .xml, .strings and many more.

dialog.msg: Are you sure you would like to delete organization {{name}}? All data will be lost!

not-found.title: Organization not found.
not-found.text: This organization link is invalid. If someone gave you this link, please check with them to resend you correct link.

forbidden.title: Forbidden.
forbidden.text: To be able to access organization, please {{link}}.

owner.title: Owner
owner.text: Unlimited access, including deletion of organization.

admin.title: Admin
admin.text: Can view and edit organization and create spreadsheets.

member.title: Member
member.text: Can only view organization and join organization spreadsheets or projects

remove.title: Remove from organization
remove.text: Remove all access to the organization. They will receive a notification.

error.last-owner: You can’t leave because there must be at least one owner.

leave.title: Leave organization
leave.text: If you leave organization, you will lose access to it.
